about_the_game:
Attention all Angel Shores and Seaside Valley bus drivers!

You want to upgrade your fleet with the content of the "Bus Simulator 21 Next Stop", including the fresh design of the new MAN Lion's City 12 city bus with three fancy interior sets? Then this is the perfect expansion pack for you!

Upgrade your Bus Simulator 21 to the Bus Simulator 21 – Extended Edition and get the following content:

1. MAN Lion's City 12

The new MAN Lion's City was designed in cooperation with the clients of MAN. All its interior and exterior improvements make it particularly appealing. This new city bus does not only look futuristic – it will also be the highlight of your bus fleet!

Enjoy this fancy 40-foot rigid bus with 2 axles, 3 doors, and 37 seats.

2. 3x Bus Interiors

The MAN Lion's City 12 bus comes with three authentic interior designs with specifically created color patterns for the seats and appealing floor textures. Go ahead and try them out (also in your other buses) and become the next transport trendsetter!

The Bus Simulator 21 Next Stop upgrade pack requires the main game.
detailed_description:
Attention all Angel Shores and Seaside Valley bus drivers!

You want to upgrade your fleet with the content of the "Bus Simulator 21 Next Stop", including the fresh design of the new MAN Lion's City 12 city bus with three fancy interior sets? Then this is the perfect expansion pack for you!

Upgrade your Bus Simulator 21 to the Bus Simulator 21 – Extended Edition and get the following content:

1. MAN Lion's City 12

The new MAN Lion's City was designed in cooperation with the clients of MAN. All its interior and exterior improvements make it particularly appealing. This new city bus does not only look futuristic – it will also be the highlight of your bus fleet!

Enjoy this fancy 40-foot rigid bus with 2 axles, 3 doors, and 37 seats.

2. 3x Bus Interiors

The MAN Lion's City 12 bus comes with three authentic interior designs with specifically created color patterns for the seats and appealing floor textures. Go ahead and try them out (also in your other buses) and become the next transport trendsetter!

The Bus Simulator 21 Next Stop upgrade pack requires the main game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2120 / AMD Phenom II X4 830 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 (2GB VRAM) / AMD Radeon R9 280 (2GB VRAM) or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4440 / AMD FC-8140z or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 (8GB VRAM) / AMD Radeon RX Vega 56 (8GB VRAM) or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
